properties.entry: SELECT USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT ADDRESS_ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL,ADDRESS_LOCAL FROM TB_ADDRESS JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO=? AND ADDRESS_TYPE='N'
SELECT ADDRESS_ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL,ADDRESS_LOCAL FROM TB_ADDRESS JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO=? AND ADDRESS_TYPE='Y'

INSERT INTO TB_ORDER ( ORDER_NO, USER_NO, ORDERER, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_EMAIL, ADDRESS, ADRRESS_DETAIL, REQUIREMENT, TOTAL_ORIGIN_PRICE, PAY_NAME, PAY_BANK, PAY_ACCOUNTNUMBER ) VALUES (SEQ_ONO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO TB_ORDER_PRODUCT ( ORDER_PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_NO, ORDER_PRODUCT_AMOUNT )
VALUES(SEQ_OPNO.NEXTVAL,?,SEQ_ONO.CURRVAL,?)
SELECT ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') PAY_DATE FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NO,PAY_DATE FROM TB_ORDER WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, PATH,CART_AMOUNT, PRICE-DISCOUNT_PRICE DCPRICE,PRODUCT_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CART USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_CART SET CART_AMOUNT = ? WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_NO =?
